categorization: Categorize the following email into one of these categories: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do. Return ONLY the category name.
action_item: Extract any action items or tasks from the email. Return them as a JSON list of strings. If none, return an empty list.
auto_reply: Draft a polite and professional reply to this email. Keep it concise. Use the context of the email to formulate the response.
